Reviews.Title: loves this
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is a really good tablet.  I just got it and have no problems.  My mom try it to she loves I am getting her one for mother's day

ProductInfo.Features:
Latest Google Android 4.2.2 Jelly Bean OS, Allwinner A23 Dual Core CPU (1.2GHz) with Quad core Mali-400 MP GPU, offer unprecedented fast surfing online, video playing and 3D games playing experience
7 inch secren display, 5 point capacitive touch screen,800*480 resolution.
8GB storage capacity, built-in Micro SD card slot allows you to add up to 32GB extra space to store songs, videos, photos and other files.
With front & back dual cameras (0.3MP & 2MP), be adequate for skype video chat and taking general picturesdroid tablet
Built-in 3.7V 3000mAh Li-Polymer rechargeable battery, enjoy longer running time (almost 3 days for stand-by status)
ProductInfo.Name: iRulu 7 inch Android Tablet PC, 4.2 Jelly Bean OS, Dual Core, Allwinner A23 CPU, Dual Cameras, 5 Point Capacitive Touch Screen, 8GB Storage,Pink Color
